评论详情: Fabric is really soft and nice quality.  Nicely packaged, and true to dize

评论概述: Sleeves a bit short but really cute overall!
评论详情: This sweater is great! It’s cut a bit wide and it hit just at the top of the waistband on me. I went to 4 over 5 stars because of two things. First, the sleeves are short. They are fine when pulled down but because of the shape, they pull up to 3/4 on me. Second, the tiger pattern is not as bold compared to the background color as shown in the picture. Otherwise I like the thickness of the sweater and that it doesn’t stretch out. It holds its shape well!

类型: Color: Rose Red Tiger PrintSize: Large
评论详情: Great sweater. The pink color is bright and attractive, especially in these dreary winter days. It’s super soft, warm, and stretchy. I just ordered another one in dark khaki in one size smaller.

类型: Color: Rose Red Tiger PrintSize: Large
评论详情: Way way way too short. No way it would tuck in to a waistband.

I am so happy with this sweater. The fabric is soft, fit is perfect, and I love the balloon style of the oversized sleeves. The tiger design is playfull but not overly tacky, so I’m not self conscious wearing this out of the house. I threw it in my washer and dryer and had no issues.
This purple is not as a deep color as the picture It is more grey! Still a soft sweater and size is as expected
